title: Episode #103: 3 Mental Self-Care Habits of the Happiest People
description:
Why are there some people who just seem to always be happy no matter what? What is their secret? Today, people are obsessed with achieving happiness yet people seem to be more and more depressed and anxious. I did some digging, and combined with my work in private practice and clinical research, I noticed a few mental habits the happiest people have in common. In this episode I discuss 3 mental self-care habits of the happiest people, and how to apply these habits in your life.
 
For more tips and free resources be sure to subscribe to my weekly email at https://drleaf.com
You will also get a bonus gift and 15% off your online order when you subscribe today.
 
NEW 21 Day Brain Detox app: https://theswitch.app
 
For more info on the possibilities mindset and thinker mindset check out my book THINK LEARN SUCCEED available on drleaf.com, Amazon, Audible, Kindle, and wherever books are sold!
